sections.title: About
sections.body: I'm a full-stack engineer with experience in building scalable applications across web, mobile, and desktop platforms. I specialize in integrating AI technologies and have a strong background in both startup environments and open-source contributions. I hold a BSc in Computer Science and Engineering from BRAC University with a 3.76 CGPA, where I co-authored an undergraduate thesis on deep learning and image processing.
